openadk.library.impl.surrogates
Interface RenderSurrogate

All Known Implementing Classes:
XPathSurrogate
public interface RenderSurrogate

The Interface representing a class that acts as a surrogate for reading and writing XML and navigating XPathss. A RenderSurrogate is assigned to ElementDefs that drastically changed structure between SIF 1.5r1 and SIF 2.0.

Version:
ADK 2.0
Author:
Andrew Elmhorst

renderRaw

void renderRaw(XMLWriter writer,
               SIFVersion version,
               Element o,
               SIFFormatter formatter)
               throws ADKException
Render this element using the underlying SIFWriter

Parameters:
writer - The XmlWriter to write to
version - The SIFVersion being written in
o - The Element to write
formatter - The SIFFormatter to use for rendering string values
Throws:
SIFException
ADKException

readRaw

boolean readRaw(javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamReader reader,
                SIFVersion version,
                SIFElement parent,
                SIFFormatter formatter)
                throws ADKParsingException
Called by the parser when it is on an element it cannot parse. Multiple RenderSurrogates may be called during a failed parse operation. If the RenderSurrogate successfully parses the XML, it returns true

Parameters:
reader - An XmlStreamReader that is positioned on the current node
version - The SIFVersion being parsed
parent - The SIFElement that is the parent of this field
formatter - The SIFFormatter to use for parsing xsd datatypes
Returns:
True if the surrogates successfully parses the node. False if the node is not recognize by the surrogate.
Throws:
SIFException - If the XML cannot be read by this surrogate
ADKParsingException

createChild

org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.model.NodePointer createChild(org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.model.NodePointer parentPointer,
                                                           SIFFormatter formatter,
                                                           SIFVersion version,
                                                           org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
Called by the ADK XPath traversal code when it is attempting to create a child element in a legacy version of SIF

Parameters:
parentPointer - The parent SIFElement that the child will be added to
version - The SIFVersion in effect
context - The current JXPath context
Returns:
A NodePointer representing the child element

createNodePointer

org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.model.NodePointer createNodePointer(org.apache.commons.jxpath.ri.model.NodePointer parentPointer,
                                                                 Element element,
                                                                 SIFVersion version)
Called by the ADK XPath traversal code when it is traversing the given element in a legace version of SIF

Parameters:
parent - The parent element pointer
element - The Element to create a node pointer for
version - The SIFVersion in effect
Returns:
A NodePointer representing the current element

Gets the element name or path to the element in this version of SIF
